content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains general information on requesting an administrative review, including
requesting an administrative review
who may request an administrative review
handling non-Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) requests for an administrative review
rejection of a request for an administrative review
, and
significance of an administrative review decision
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section A  - Compensation Service and Pension and Fiduciary (P&F) Service Guidance
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section A
